duties_responsibilities.duty: Performing automotive systems services and repairs, including brakes, electrical, engine performance, heating/air conditioning, suspension/steering, transmissions, drivetrains, and axles.
Conducting vehicle and customer service, including pre/post-service road tests, vehicle inspections, and explaining mechanical diagnoses and repairs to non-mechanical individuals.
Managing store operations, including maintaining cleanliness and orderliness, reviewing equipment efficiency, attending meetings, and providing on-the-job training.
Performing physical tasks, such as tire and wheel service, oil changes, alignments, fluid services, and brake services.

education_certification.credential: Valid automobile driver’s license, 2 years of automotive repair experience, or completion of a Vocational-Technical School program in a related field
